mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moment (user_id, content, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM moment WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.user_id AS userId, u.username, m.content, m.create_time AS createTime, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM moment_like WHERE moment_id = m.id) AS likeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM moment_like WHERE moment_id = m.id AND user_id = #{userId}) AS likedByCurrentUser FROM moment m JOIN user u ON m.user_id = u.userId ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, content, create_time AS createTime FROM moment WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
